item.title: Hello Blog
item.description: This is my first Blog of quarantine My spring term become online courses, but I am pretty sure I have to find a job in the Fall term. This blog gonna record all the things I gonna learn and build for the 6 months. Here are some plans I gonna do: [] raspberry Pi for web server(learn Linux as well) [] Loorent It is a big project I want to do but I hate front end, so I always relay on that, but I think it’s time for it [] Android app
